title: Executive Order 9308-Revoking the Designation of Gastonia, North Carolina, as a Customs Port of Entry in Customs Collection District Number 15 (North Carolina)
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 1 of the act of August 1, 1914, 38 Stat. 609, 623 (U.S.C., title 19, sec. 2), it is ordered that the designation of Gastonia, North Carolina, as a customs port of entry in Customs Collection District Number 15 (North Carolina), be, and it is hereby, revoked, effective this date.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 9308-Revoking the Designation of Gastonia, North Carolina, as a Customs Port of Entry in Customs Collection District Number 15 (North Carolina) Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372711
